review: Doctors way of talking was so comfortable that we got relaxed after having lots of worries in our minds as parents and the way of treating the patient is very good especially the kid's. I recommend that he is a good doctor for children's of any age

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: All Pediatric Problems ,Children's Health,Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,
review:
Dr Anand Rao has been our children's paediatrician for the last 15 years! Over the years he has become a very good family friend, as well, besides being the role model for our daughter who is now doing her 2nd year MBBS. 

Few things that stand out are his very calm demeanour, high level of patience, top notch diagnosis and absolute minimal prescription of drugs! In the last 15 years his diagnosis has always been very accurate. As a parent, consulting him has always been comforting and reassuring as we know he will solve any illness or issue that we take up to him! My wife and I feel that we are indeed lucky to have come across someone like Dr Anand Rao!

review: We consulted Dr. Anand on recommendation by another doctor. He is an EXAMPLE for all the doctors. His patient hearing, detailed examination and expert advice has put us at ease and the child is doing well.  We highly recommend this doctor to every parent that is panicky about their child's health.  His diagnosis and treatment are to be lauded.  Thank you doctor for your support in helping our child overcome his problems and bringing a smile on our faces.  Keep up the great job!

review: I would say about him "simply awesome". Extremely friendly in nature with cool explanation about the issue.

review: We have been consulting our daughter to doctor Anand Rao for her health from past 3 years. We started going to this doctor since our daughter was infected with Kawasaki disease when she was 1.5 years old.  The treatment provided by the doctor was always great. He has a positive attitude and of all the doctors that we have consulted for our daughter, she had recovered well with doctor Anand Rao.
